tool_description: Horse Racing and Golf odds from the UK's biggest bookmakers
name: UK Betting Odds
title: UK Betting Odds

api_list.name: Odds
api_list.description: Use the odds method to request the latest bookmaker odds for your chosen sport.

api_list.name: Events
api_list.description: Use the events method to request the upcoming events for your chosen sport.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://uk-betting-odds.p.rapidapi.com/v1/horse_racing/events/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "uk-betting-odds.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://uk-betting-odds.p.rapidapi.com/v1/{sport}/events/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "uk-betting-odds.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
